entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:13 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
